pullrequest.title: Node.hh: don't dereference _cb when it isn't a pointer

content.raw:
I've added a test called `REGRESSION_deprecated` for all the deprecated functions. The deprecation warnings are suppressed only for that one test executable.

I verified that without the change on line 542 in `Node.hh`, the `REGRESSION_deprecated` test fails to compile. That one fix seems to be the only one that was needed.
content.html:
